divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving down the street when a something shiny caugt my eye so i looked up and saw a disc in the sky it was just above the clouds at first i thought it was a weather baloon, but it was going much too fast {about 600 miles per hour} it was going in a straight line i was excited and afraid at the same time also a little confused but i was very happy despite being confused and afraid after a few seconds it dissapeared behind a cloud.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Newport
There were no other sightings in Newport on or around July 31st 2007
